articles.title: 'A big wow': See Amanpour's reaction to Boris Johnson's resignation speech - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Christiane Amanpour discusses the resignation speech of UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson, who was forced to resign by his own party after a series of scandals.

articles.author: Mark Thompson, CNN Business
articles.title: Boris Johnson leaves an economic mess for his successor to fix
articles.description: Boris Johnson was ultimately forced to resign as UK prime minister Thursday as dozens of members of his party quit the government after one ethics scandal too many.

articles.author: Analysis by Luke McGee, CNN
articles.title: Boris Johnson: How the nation's favorite clown fell from grace
articles.description: Boris Johnson is set to resign as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, bringing his scandal-plagued tenure to an end after less than three years.

articles.author: Luke McGee, Ivana Kottasová and Jack Guy, CNN
articles.title: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson is to resign as Conservative Party leader
articles.description: Boris Johnson is to resign as the Conservative Party leader on Thursday and is expected to address the nation in the coming hours.

articles.author: By Tara John, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Boris Johnson, UK Prime Minister, to resign
articles.description: Boris Johnson is to resign as Conservative Party leader today. He will speak to the country in the coming hours. Follow live updates.
articles.content:
Boris Johnson was rocked by more resignations on Thursday morning as a growing number of ruling Conservative Party lawmakers attempt to force the UK Prime Minister out of 10 Downing Street.

articles.title: Live updates: Boris Johnson, UK Prime Minister, resigns
articles.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson has announced his resignation. Follow live updates.
articles.content:
UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson has announced his resignation as Conservative party leader following a wave of government resignations.

articles.author: By Helen Regan, Sana Noor Haq and Ed Upright, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine
articles.description: Russia is likely to mount an offensive on Sloviansk, a city military chief said, as strikes on the Donetsk region intensify and civilians were urged to evacuate. Meanwhile, G20 foreign ministers meet in Bali. Follow here for live updates.
articles.content:

articles.title: McCabe says his and Comey's selection for 'rigorous' IRS audits should be investigated
articles.description: Former FBI Deputy Director Andrew McCabe on Wednesday said an investigation should be launched into how he and former FBI Director James Comey were both selected by the Internal Revenue Service for an intensive tax audit.

articles.title: Analysis: What to make of a looming recession amid a strong labor market

articles.title: FBI Director Wray, MI5 chief raise alarm over China spying
articles.description: Top US and British law enforcement officials called attention to what they said is the serious security and economic threat posed by China
